Html:
Hi,

I'm using VS2010[wpf / C# & Oracle DB11G]

This is the first time I'm using D3. I download latest version from this link.

http://dynamicdatadisplay.codeplex.com/SourceControl/changeset/changes/31108

My requirement in a chart,

1. Multiple Y axis.

2. Change color X-axis and Y Axis

3. Zooming

4. Real Time Data. ie. When the data is add to datagrid it must be update or reflect to the Chart /// this is important///

well, while I search for Zooming in a discussion List I got a link. //https://skydrive.live.com/?cid=eaf0a921258b5980&id=EAF0A921258B5980%212673 

this dynamicdatadisplay.dll will work only zooming. not others like Simulation project.[adding data continuously to chat from text file]

In the Above skydrive link, I found many project like color axis, zoom etc... but its works separately not work altogether.

My Question is, For all my above requirements which DLL I need to Download and Use.

Please Tell me.

Thanks,

thenndral.
